page_information.description: Comprehensive page metadata including page number and content classification.

page_number_integer.description: Page number converted to an integer, or null if not present. Convert Roman numerals (i, ii, xii) to Arabic (1, 2, 12). Page numbers typically appear in headers or footers.

page_number_type.description: Numbering system: 'roman' for Roman numerals, 'arabic' for standard numerals, 'none' if no page number is visible.

page_types.description: 1-3 page classifications. Select ALL that apply: 'content' for main body text with summarizable prose; 'abstract' for abstracts (will be summarized); 'preface' for forewords/dedications; 'appendix' for supplementary material; 'figures_tables_sources' for lists of figures/tables; 'table_of_contents' for TOC; 'bibliography' for reference lists; 'title_page' for title/cover pages; 'index' for back-of-book indices; 'blank' for empty pages; 'copyright' for imprint pages; 'other' if none apply. Common combinations: ['content'], ['content', 'bibliography'], ['abstract'], ['content', 'abstract'].

bullet_points.description: 2-5 concise bullet points capturing essential ideas. Include LaTeX formulas in $$ delimiters. Provide bullet points for pages with summarizable prose: content, abstract, preface, appendix, figures_tables_sources. Set to null ONLY for pages without summarizable semantic content: table_of_contents, bibliography, title_page, index, blank, copyright, other.

references.description: Bibliographic citations in APA style. Extract from ALL page types. Set to null only if no citations present.
